snippet: The stock market ended a two-day advance, in part because of concerns over Greece and quarterly reports that fell short of revenue targets.
abstract: Stocks decline following two-day run, reflecting investor concerns as price of oil climbs and Greece remains in standoff with its European creditors.
lead_paragraph: The stock market ended a two-day advance, in part because of concerns over Greece and quarterly reports that fell short of revenue targets.

headline.main: Market Reverses as Crude Oil Makes a Comeback
headline.print_headline: Market Reverses as Crude Oil Makes a Comeback
